Title: Data Science Internship / Working Student
Description:
Company Description

Sika is a specialty chemicals company with a globally leading position in the development and production of systems and products for bonding, sealing, damping, reinforcing, and protection in the building sector and industry. Sika has subsidiaries in 103 countries around the world, produces in over 400 factories, and develops innovative technologies for customers worldwide. In doing so, it plays a crucial role in enabling the transformation of the construction and transportation industries toward greater environmental compatibility. In 2024, Sika’s around 33,000 employees generated annual sales of CHF 11.76 billion.

Job Description

For our Web- & eCommerce Team we are looking for an additional member, who can be a full-time intern as well as staying with us longer term as a part-time working student.

As we have multiple different projects, we are able to offer interesting topics for students who are looking to gain some experience in fields such as; data science and data engineering, business analysis, and other technical fields in order to create business applications and automate processes.

Example Assignments


Functional and semantic similarity modelling for chemical products
Recommendation/ranking algorithms for eCommerce platform
Exposing training materials with interactive chatbots
Website parsing with AI avoiding hallucinations and information loss


What We Offer


Dynamic and fun team
Multicultural environment
Working with senior tech leads
Visibility to IT management if that is perceived motivating
Well defined projects in case school requires formal documentations for credit(s)


Qualifications

Basic understanding of:


at least one programming/scripting language
database technologies and a query language
data engineering and science basics


Soft Skills


Willingness to learn
Enjoyment of problem solving
English language is needed, German/Spanish knowledge is advantage


Additional Information

For insights into what our colleagues say about working at Sika, please click here.

We look forward to your direct online application.

Title: Sr. ML/AI Specialist
Description:
Sr. ML/AI Specialist- Revolutionize DeFi with a Growing Protocol | Zug, Switzerland




Are you ready to shape the future of society with your expertise in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence? We are seeking a dynamic and entrepreneurial Sr. ML/AI Specialist to join our fast-growing team in Switzerland. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on innovative projects in the crypto and blockchain sector.




About the Role




As a Sr. ML/AI Specialist, you will conduct deep quantitative analysis to inform capital deployment and investment strategies, as well as support research in risk management, portfolio optimization, and market analysis.

Source, compile, clean, and analyze data across various markets.
Build and develop models to identify trends and patterns.
Implement ML-based approaches for DeFi strategies.
Present findings with effective data visualization.







What Makes You the Ideal Sr. ML/AI Specialist




Minimum 2 years of experience with machine learning and statistical analysis methods.
Strong interest in the cryptocurrency sector, particularly DeFi.
Background in finance or computer/data science with a deep understanding of financial markets.
Proficiency in essential software tools for model implementation; skills in Solidity are a significant asset.







Why You Should Consider This Role - Sr. ML/AI Specialist




Competitive compensation, bonus, and participation opportunities.
Modern working conditions and ample opportunities for personal and professional development.
A supportive team atmosphere with flat hierarchies and a strong entrepreneurial spirit.
Exposure to talented colleagues and clients with unique investment profiles.







If you're self-motivated, disciplined, and detail-oriented, and you thrive in a dynamic environment, apply now for the Sr. ML/AI Specialist position. Be part of a team that adapts traditional portfolio optimization methods to a DeFi yield-focused context and collaborate with a software team to automate data collection and analysis processes.







Take Your Career to the Next Level as a Sr. ML/AI Specialist! Apply Today!

Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
On behalf of our client Hilo by Aktiia, and as part of an exclusive mandate, we are seeking a versatile and motivated individual to join their pioneering team as a




MACHINE LEARING ENGINEER 100%




Company Overview

Hilo by Aktiia believes, the key to improving cardiovascular health is to provide patients and physicians with a deeper understanding of the blood pressure pattern. Before Hilo, it was not possible to monitor cardiovascular health at scale.

They are an early-stage, venture-backed start-up that has raised over $96M from top-tier investors in Europe and the United States. They have developed and brought to market the world's first continuous blood pressure monitor. Their technology is based on 18 years of research by their founders at the prestigious Swiss Center for Electronics and Microtechnology (CSEM). Hilo by Aktiia's solution has been validated through extensive clinical trials and received a CE Mark as a Class IIa medical device under MDR leading to commercial access of approximately 43 countries worldwide.







Responsibilities

Design, develop, optimize, and document innovative AI models for blood pressure estimation from optical signals
Analyze model limitations and devise strategies to enhance performance, addressing key challenges
Collaborate and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams to solve complex technical problems




Your profile

M.Sc or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or a relevant field
2+ years of industry experience applying Deep Learning techniques, ideally in a highly regulated field (medtech, banking, …)
Experience in developing, fine-tuning, and evaluating neural network architectures on large-scale datasets
Experience in performing verification and validation (V&V) activities of developed models
Experience in deploying machine learning models in a production environment
Deep understanding of statistical learning, CNNs, and RNNs
Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, etc.) + AWS
Experience in medical signal processing or time series analysis is a plus
Strong communication skills in English (both written and spoken)
Creative and hands-on approach to problem-solving
Comfortable working in a multidisciplinary, multicultural, and diversity-oriented team
Highly organized and meticulous in code development and documentation, ensuring thorough traceability and clarity in compliance with medical device industry standards
Based in Switzerland, with a valid Swiss work permit




Benefits

Pension
Competitive compensation package based on experience
Flexible work location (hybrid work schedule)







Are you passionate in solving problems with visionaries and innovative approaches?




Then Flurin Schwager looks forward to receiving your application documents or your call.

Show more

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
At Pixel Plus, we are pioneering AI-driven solutions, combining Azure AI Foundry with open-source technologies to build scalable, cutting-edge AI platforms tailored to our clients' needs. Our AI-powered platform enables rapid development and deployment of AI applications.




We are now looking for an AI Engineer to join our team and help shape the future of AI in our projects.




🚀 Join us and drive innovation at the intersection of proprietary and open-source AI!


Tasks



Design, develop, and optimize AI models by combining Azure AI Foundry with open-source technologies, LLMs, and machine learning services.


Enhance and scale our AI Platform, integrating RAG, LLMs, and ML pipelines into real-world applications.


Develop AI agents leveraging Azure AI Foundry and open-source frameworks, enabling a ChatGPT-like experience tailored to different industries.


Work closely with engineering teams to implement best practices in AI deployment, security, and performance.


Collaborate with clients to understand business needs and transform them into scalable AI-driven solutions.


Ensure seamless integration with Azure services and open-source tools, including Cognitive Services, OpenAI models, and vector databases.



Requirements



Proven experience working with Azure AI Foundry and open-source AI ecosystems.


Strong background in LLM fine-tuning, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and AI-driven application development.


Proficiency in Python, ML frameworks, and cloud-native AI solutions.


Hands-on experience with Azure Cognitive Services, OpenAI APIs, and vector search.


Experience in AI security, MLOps, and deploying scalable AI solutions.


Ability to troubleshoot and optimize AI models for performance and accuracy.


Fluent in English (German is a plus).



Benefits



Exciting AI-driven projects with a strong focus on innovation.


Flexible work environment (remote or hybrid options).


Opportunity to lead AI initiatives in a fast-growing company.


Competitive salary & benefits.


Collaboration with AI & cloud experts shaping the future of AI.





Pixel Plus is an equal opportunity employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Title: Full Stack Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
What You'll Do

Build, optimize, and deploy end-to-end ML pipelines for computer vision, NLP, and multi-agent LLM systems, ensuring scalability for real-time and high-load applications.
Design microservice-based backend architectures using FastAPI, Flask, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, with robust API integrations (REST, asynchronous workflows) and Redis caching.
Industrialize AI solutions using NVIDIA Triton, vLLM, and ONNX Runtime, focusing on model quantization, low-latency inference, and seamless integration with hardware/embedded systems.
Architect Kubernetes-managed deployments with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions), containerization (Docker), and infrastructure monitoring (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack).
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into production-grade AI solutions for industries like healthcare, manufacturing, and public services.
Develop hardware-software integrations for robotic systems, including sensor fusion, microcontroller programming, and simulations.







What You Bring

Bachelor's/Master's degree in Software Development, Robotics, or Electrical Engineering with a focus on Computer Vision, AI, or Control Systems.
5+ years of hands-on experience in ML/CV Engineering: PyTorch, TensorFlow, OpenCV, Vision Transformers (ViT), and fine-tuning models for domain-specific tasks (e.g., object detection, text analytics).
5+ years of hands-on experience in Backend Development: Microservice design, both relational and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and API security (OAuth2, JWT).
5+ years of hands-on experience in Production Deployment: Kubernetes, Docker, and optimization of high-concurrency systems (1,000+ users).
Proficiency in embedded systems: Experience with microcontrollers programming, and sensor integration.
Practical knowledge of control theory (PID, state-space) and physics-based modeling (Lagrangian/Hamiltonian dynamics for robotic systems). Proficiency in Gazebo/ROS2 is a plus.
Software architecture expertise: Design of scalable, fault-tolerant systems with clear service boundaries and async communication. Practical experience of designing micro-service architecture applications.
Fluent English (written/spoken); German or French is a plus.
Proactive problem-solver with a track record of delivering optimized, business-impactful solutions on tight deadlines.







Why Join Us

Work on high-impact AI projects with direct applications in healthcare, manufacturing, and public services
Flexible working hours, workplace Aarau, Switzerland
Young, ambitious, and collaborative team culture
Competitive compensation package depending on experience
Access to continuous learning and cutting-edge tools in ML and software engineering

Title: Research Engineer, Applied AI
Description:
As a research engineer you will work on improving kapa’s ability to answer harder and harder technical questions. Check out Docker’s documentation for a live example of what kapa is (look for the “Ask AI” button).

In This Role, You Will


Work directly with the founding team and our software engineers.
Work on and do research in state-of-the-art retrieval and search techniques.
Work on and deploy machine learning models as part of RAG.
Continuously improve our quality evaluation frameworks to enable robust iteration.
Keep up with the latest developments in the space and see how they can be applied.
Design and run experiments.


In addition to the founding team, you'll have support from a number of leading academics in the field that are all close advisors (incl. Douwe Kiela, author of the original RAG paper).

You May Be a Good Fit If You Have


A Master's/ PhD degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Statistics or a related field.
A detailed understanding of machine learning, deep learning (including LLMs) and natural language processing.
Hands-on experience in training, fine-tuning and deploying large language models.
Have prior experience working with vector databases, search indices, or other data stores for search and retrieval use cases.
Significant experience building evaluation systems for LLMs or search.
Familiarity with various information retrieval techniques, such as lexical search and dense vector search.
The ability to work effectively in a fast in a environment where things are sometimes loosely defined.
Want to learn more about machine learning research.
This is neither an exhaustive nor necessary set of attributes. Even if none of these apply to you, but you believe you will contribute to kapa.ai, please reach out.

Title: Research Scientist, GenAI Speech (London)
Description:
The GenAI Speech team is looking for a Research Scientist (Speech and Language). The GenAI Speech team works on large language models (LLMs) with native supporting for processing, understanding and generating of audio and speech as a modality besides others such as text or vision. As part of this, we are leveraging knowledge in areas like speech/audio encoders/tokenizer, pre-training, post-training, (online) reinforcement learning, LLM alignment, multimodal modelling, speech and audio processing, speech recognition (ASR), speech synthesis (TTS), and multilingual modelling. Our work is focused on advancing core technologies to drive and advance core product experiences at Meta such as Meta AI which is available on e.g. RayBan Meta glasses or within WhatsApp.

Research Scientist, GenAI Speech (London) Responsibilities:


Lead research to advance audio and speech technologies using large language models that can be applied to a wide area of Meta production use cases.
Work towards long-term ambitious research and production goals, while identifying intermediate milestones.
Influence progress of relevant research communities by producing publications.


Minimum Qualifications:


Ph.D. and established track record of leading and/or contributing to influential research, such as as evidenced by high-impact publications at peer-reviewed AI conferences (e.g. Interspeech, ICASSP, ASRU, SLT, NeurIPS, CVPR, ICML, ICLR, ICCV, ACL)
Experience in generative AI research, especially in building and optimising large language models for areas of audio/ speech processing and understanding, computer vision and/or natural language understanding.
Experience communicating research for public audiences of peers, as well as non-technical audiences.
Experience in leading theoretical and empirical research and for answering questions with research.
Experience in training, fine-tuning, and/or experimenting with foundation models beyond black-box use.
Familiarity with one or more deep learning frameworks (e.g. pytorch, tensorflow, …).


Preferred Qualifications:


2+ years of work experience in a faculty, industry, or government research position with primary emphasis on AI research.
Experience in building large language models for audio/ speech processing, understanding, and generation.
Experience driving original scholarship in collaboration with a team.
Experience in developing and debugging in C/C++, Python, PyTorch.


About Meta:

Meta builds technologies that help people connect, find communities, and grow businesses. When Facebook launched in 2004, it changed the way people connect. Apps like Messenger, Instagram and WhatsApp further empowered billions around the world. Now, Meta is moving beyond 2D screens toward immersive experiences like augmented and virtual reality to help build the next evolution in social technology. People who choose to build their careers by building with us at Meta help shape a future that will take us beyond what digital connection makes possible today—beyond the constraints of screens, the limits of distance, and even the rules of physics.

Individual compensation is determined by skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Compensation details listed in this posting reflect the base hourly rate, monthly rate, or annual salary only, and do not include bonus, equity or sales incentives, if applicable. In addition to base compensation, Meta offers benefits. Learn more about benefits at Meta.
Show more
HTML:
The GenAI Speech team is looking for a Research Scientist (Speech and Language). The GenAI Speech team works on large language models (LLMs) with native supporting for processing, understanding and generating of audio and speech as a modality besides others such as text or vision. As part of this, we are leveraging knowledge in areas like speech/audio encoders/tokenizer, pre-training, post-training, (online) reinforcement learning, LLM alignment, multimodal modelling, speech and audio processing, speech recognition (ASR), speech synthesis (TTS), and multilingual modelling. Our work is focused on advancing core technologies to drive and advance core product experiences at Meta such as Meta AI which is available on e.g. RayBan Meta glasses or within WhatsApp.

Research Scientist, GenAI Speech (London) Responsibilities:

  • Lead research to advance audio and speech technologies using large language models that can be applied to a wide area of Meta production use cases.
  • Work towards long-term ambitious research and production goals, while identifying intermediate milestones.
  • Influence progress of relevant research communities by producing publications.

Minimum Qualifications:

  • Ph.D. and established track record of leading and/or contributing to influential research, such as as evidenced by high-impact publications at peer-reviewed AI conferences (e.g. Interspeech, ICASSP, ASRU, SLT, NeurIPS, CVPR, ICML, ICLR, ICCV, ACL)
  • Experience in generative AI research, especially in building and optimising large language models for areas of audio/ speech processing and understanding, computer vision and/or natural language understanding.
  • Experience communicating research for public audiences of peers, as well as non-technical audiences.
  • Experience in leading theoretical and empirical research and for answering questions with research.
  • Experience in training, fine-tuning, and/or experimenting with foundation models beyond black-box use.
  • Familiarity with one or more deep learning frameworks (e.g. pytorch, tensorflow, …).

Preferred Qualifications:

  • 2+ years of work experience in a faculty, industry, or government research position with primary emphasis on AI research.
  • Experience in building large language models for audio/ speech processing, understanding, and generation.
  • Experience driving original scholarship in collaboration with a team.
  • Experience in developing and debugging in C/C++, Python, PyTorch.

About Meta:

Meta builds technologies that help people connect, find communities, and grow businesses. When Facebook launched in 2004, it changed the way people connect. Apps like Messenger, Instagram and WhatsApp further empowered billions around the world. Now, Meta is moving beyond 2D screens toward immersive experiences like augmented and virtual reality to help build the next evolution in social technology. People who choose to build their careers by building with us at Meta help shape a future that will take us beyond what digital connection makes possible today—beyond the constraints of screens, the limits of distance, and even the rules of physics.

Individual compensation is determined by skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Compensation details listed in this posting reflect the base hourly rate, monthly rate, or annual salary only, and do not include bonus, equity or sales incentives, if applicable. In addition to base compensation, Meta offers benefits. Learn more about benefits at Meta.

Title: Trainee Meteorology & Data Science
Description:
Workload: 80-100%

Are you interested to get started in the evolving energy industry?⚡Do you want to explore and learn how meteorology and climate shape the energy markets?

Become part of the Axpo Trainee community! Collaborate with various divisions and gain exciting and in-depth insights into the world of energy. You work in three different teams and build up your network among the whole group.

The perfect start for your future career as a meteorologist! 💯 The traineeship begins on 1st of October 2025 and is limited to 18 months with the option of a permanent position.

What you will do:


Work on different operational and strategic tasks in your assignments and take on responsibility for ongoing projects from day one
Support the meteorology desk 🌧️ in your first assignment with the daily forecasting tasks by compiling and analysing meteorological data for operational reports, with a particular interest in dynamics that are critical to your stakeholders
Develop projects to bring insightful quantifications and visualisations on the weather and climate evolution to drive decision-making in different areas of the company
Perform data analysis with reanalysis data and numerical weather model data in order to improve medium to extended range forecasting capabilities of the meteorology desk of Axpo
Utilize programming languages such as Python to analyse meteorological data and build operational forecasting tools
Assist in identifying patterns and trends in the data relevant to energy forecasting
An international component will be part of your traineeship during the second assignment. Our team in Oslo 🌎 is looking forward to welcoming you



What you bring & who you are:


Master’s degree 🎓 in Meteorology, Atmospheric Science, or a related field (no more than 2 years of post-graduation professional experience)
Good understanding of atmospheric dynamics, knowledge of scientific literature about subseasonal to seasonal (S2S) predictability is a plus
Strong interest in meteorology and its applications in the energy markets
Strong coding skills in either Python, R or Matlab machine learning methods for weather data analysis.
Experience in analysing meteorological datasets, such as reanalysis data, satellite data or numerical weather prediction model data. Experience in hydrology / hydrological modelling is a plus
First work experience as an intern or working student
Great communication skills and high degree of initiative and flexibility
Fluency in English and German, further languages are a plus



About the team:

You will become part of the 18th trainee generation. Meet regularly for several events, whether it’s lunch or even power plant visits. Take advantage from our internal learning platforms, courses, and other opportunities to shape your skills and expand your network.

The Meteorology team at Axpo is fast moving and innovative, trying to convey probabilistic and statistical views on the future weather developments in Europe and the rest of the World. We collaborate broadly with many groups within the company and carry Axpo’s exposure to weather on multiple facets of our operations.

You will work in the office in Baden, with the flexibility to work from home as well. The fixed traineeship salary is CHF 86’000 per year, including several attractive fringe benefits.

Find more details to the traineeship here.

Title: Développeur React / Python
Description:
📣 Qim info, qui sommes-nous ?

Société d’ingénierie informatique et de services du numérique créée en 2004 et implantée en Suisse (Genève, Lausanne, Zurich & Bâle) et en France (Annecy, Lyon & Paris).

Qim info c’est surtout un ensemble de consultant.e.s capables d’intervenir à tous les niveaux d’un Système d’Information sur différents métiers (Etudes & Développement, Fonctionnel, Infrastructures & Réseaux, Data, DevOps ...) mais aussi différents secteurs d’activités (Banque, Finance, Assurance, Luxe, Retail, Aéronautique ...).

Avec plus de 600 collaborateurs, nous sommes toujours à la recherche de nouveaux talents !

Qim info obtient une note globale de 4.1/5 sur Glassdoor et se place en 3ème position du classement ICTJournal en 2023.




📌 En quelques mots

Dans le cadre d’un projet à forte visibilité, nous recherchons un(e) développeur(se) fullstack React / Python, capable d’évoluer dans un environnement exigeant, rythmé et orienté delivery.




🎯Votre mission

Vos missions incluront :

Développer et faire évoluer un front-end React/Next.js robuste et performant
Participer au développement des API et services back-end en Python (Django/Flask)
Être garant(e) de la qualité, de la performance et de la maintenabilité du code
Travailler en lien direct avec les équipes produit, design et métier
Participer aux revues de code, proposer des améliorations techniques




💼 Votre profil

Minimum 3 ans d’expérience en React et Python
À l’aise avec les bonnes pratiques (testing, CI/CD, clean code)
Capacité à gérer le stress et les deadlines serrées
Bilingue FR/EN, à l’oral comme à l’écrit
Autonome, rigoureux(se), et orienté(e) solutions




🏆 Conditions du poste

Genève📍
Contrat CDI 📄
Démarrage dès que possible 📆




💥Les étapes pour nous rencontrer

Notre équipe de chargés de recrutement est votre premier point de contact. A votre écoute, leur métier est de comprendre votre parcours, et de tenir compte de votre projet de vie et de vos attentes afin de vous proposer des missions qui vous correspondent.
Selon votre domaine d’expertise, nous vous proposons d’échanger et de parler technique avec l’un de nos collaborateurs.
Contexte, constitution de l’équipe en place, objectifs, expertise technique demandée, challenges à relever : cet entretien avec un Business Manager vous permet de connaître en détail les missions ou projets sur lesquels nous pourrions être amenés à travailler ensemble.
Un nouveau challenge au poste qui vous correspond !




🙌 Pourquoi choisir Qim info ?




🛠 Une expertise reconnue dans le monde du conseil avec une activité tournée autour d’une dizaine de secteurs d’activités et une connaissance de l’ensemble des métiers de l’IT.




🤜🤛 Une proximité et un suivi RH & managérial de qualité avec nos consultants pour les accompagner dans leur montée en compétences et dans leur mission au quotidien.




🥳 Nous rejoindre, c’est aussi partager plus qu’une pause-café ! Qim techs talks, soirées d’entreprises... De nombreux événements sont organisés chaque année, de quoi se créer de beaux souvenirs ensemble !




🔎 Vous souhaitez en savoir plus ?

Nous attendons avec impatience votre candidature 😊




Politique de confidentialité

Les informations que vous fournissez au cours de la procédure de candidature seront utilisées conformément à la politique de confidentialité de Qim info. En soumettant votre candidature, vous reconnaissez et acceptez les conditions énoncées dans cette déclaration de confidentialité.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (Computer Vision)
Description:
About the job


Scandit gives people superpowers. Whether enabling delivery drivers to make quicker deliveries, matching a patient with their medication, or allowing retailers to make store operations more efficient, our technology automates workflows. It provides actionable insights to help businesses in a variety of industries. Join us as we continue to expand, grow, innovate, and help take Scandit to the next level.Our newest product, ShelfView, is a machine learning-powered platform for retail that enables real time shelf visibility and empowers more intelligent and efficient store operations. With our scalable smart data capture technology via fixed cameras and mobile devices, retailers are on track to save tens of millions in operating expense and in turn generate tens of million more in value for their customers.We are looking for a new colleague to join the ShelfView team and work on creating digital twins of retail shelves. You will be responsible for evolving our current product by adding new features and optimizing the existing offering. You will work on computer vision and deep learning algorithms to improve shelf recognition beyond state of the art.If these challenges sound interesting to you, we’d love to hear from you!




What you will do





Driving and solving fine grained product recognition on retail shelves for our customer use cases


Be involved hands on in all phases of end to end quality improvements (defining and tracking metrics, prototyping, testing, integration of existing models, creation of new models, data collection, analysis, debugging)


Stay up to date with the latest research in detection, segmentation and long tailed object recognition


Set direction and identify opportunities to push boundaries of recognition


Mentoring team members on code quality and engineering practices



Who you are


You are an experienced ML engineer who is passionate about building, shipping, and improving machine learning-powered systems. You have a proven track record of delivering state-of-the-art computer vision systems with a cloud component and firsthand experience bringing them from the prototyping stage to production.




You recognize that software development encompasses both technology and human interaction and feel comfortable working independently or on a team. While you stay on top of the state-of-the-art in CV/ML, you value proven technologies and small increments. You are creative and determined to solve real-world problems by thinking outside the box and making an impact. You thrive on tackling open problems, taking ownership, and effectively overcoming obstacles. You pay attention to details and at the same time are able to take pragmatic shortcuts to reach our goals.




In particular, we are excited to hear from you if the following sounds like you:





7+ years of experience solving recognition problems in the industry with a proven track record of launched products


Fluency in Python and another language (e.g. C/C++, Go or Rust)


Experience with relevant machine learning frameworks (Pytorch, Jax, Tensorflow)


Have firsthand experience with cloud-based development (databases, service-oriented architecture, data pipelines)


Skilled in software design, problem-solving, and debugging


Experience in building visual search systems or a retrieval-augmented LLM systems is a plus



Our tech stack



Python 3.11, Pytorch, Django


MySQL and PostgreSQL


AWS, Kubernetes, GitLab CI






What we offer


Here are just some of the reasons why people choose to build their career at Scandit:





We are certified as a “Great Place to Work” in 10 countries!


Opportunity to work with world-class sales leaders and SaaS experts


Smart, people-first culture


An attractive individual equity plan in a high growth company 


Flexible, office, hybrid or home working


Innovation hackathons for all - not just the techies


Team outings 


Festive/end of year all company celebrations 


Your birthday off 


Learning and development opportunities


Top notch tech pack to enable you to do your most productive work


Brand new optimized-for-hybrid working HQ in Zurich as well as local offices in hotspots London, Tampere, Warsaw, Singapore and Tokyo


As well as specific benefits related to the location you are joining





Who we are




Scandit enables enterprises and consumers to change the way they interact with everyday objects and augment the physical world with real-time data captured by scanning barcodes and recognizing text, objects, and other visual identifiers using smartphones, tablets, wearables, drones and robots.




Scandit’s mobile data capture platform is built on proprietary computer vision, augmented reality, and machine learning technologies. Companies in industries such as retail, transportation & logistics, manufacturing, and healthcare can use Scandit’s technology to create and power mobile apps for crucial enterprise workflows like mobile point of sale, mobile shopping, self-checkout, inventory management, and proof of delivery.




Many of the world’s most innovative and successful companies are benefiting from Scandit’s enterprise-grade mobile data capture platform, including Sephora, Nissan, DHL, and Levi Strauss & Co.




Scandit was founded by a group of researchers from ETH Zurich and MIT. The company is headquartered in Zurich and is also represented in Boston, London, Warsaw, Tokyo and Tampere. Over the years, our company has evolved into a world-class team of mobile image processing, cloud-computing and “Internet of Things” experts from around the globe and has most recently also opened an office in Tampere, Finland.




“Everybody is welcome here” - Is a celebrated component of our DNA.




At Scandit we strive to create an inclusive environment that empowers our employees. We believe that our products and services benefit from our diverse backgrounds and experiences and are proud to be a safe space for all.




All qualified applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, nationality, religion, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, age, physical [dis]ability or length of time spent unemployed.

Title: AI Engineer - Computer Vision
Description:
We are looking for a machine learning & computer vision expert to strengthen our team in Zurich.

The goal of this position is to develop and fine-tune state of the art vision and 3D geometric models for scene segmentation and scene understanding.

Requirements

Experience with developing and training state of the art (transformer-based) vision models. Experience with 3D models to operate on point clouds is a plus.

Particularly:


PhD or master's degree in computer vision or machine learning with relevant project experience (e.g. master thesis)
Excellent knowledge of Python, PyTorch and the training of deep neural networks
Hands-on experience in the training and deployment of 2D and 3D segmentation and environment understanding models
Robotics experience is a plus.


We are looking for a person who enjoys working in a team in a very dynamic and fast-moving environment, and who is able and willing to take ownership of projects and decisions.

Benefits

We at Flexion Robotics (flexion.ai) are a young company in Zurich working on the next generation of humanoid robot software to enable robots to perform useful tasks autonomously.

We work dynamically and move fast. The team is still fairly small and every new employee at this stage will have significant ownership of their current project.

We offer a competitive remuneration in the form of a competitive base salary and additional components/benefits depending on the specific role and the experience of the applicant.

Title: Deine Traumstelle? / Your dream job?
Description:
(See below for the English version)




Bei unseren aktuellen Stellenausschreibungen ist nicht das Passende dabei? Lass uns wissen was deine persönliche Traumstelle wäre und bewirb dich drauf!




Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach tollen Kolleginnen und Kollegen, welche uns helfen, Open Source Lösungen zu erstellen, zu implementieren, zu bewerben und zu verkaufen.

Title: MLOps Engineer
Description:
At Akkodis Switzerland, we're looking for a skilled MLOps Engineer to join our team and play a key role in shaping and supporting cutting-edge AI infrastructure. You’ll work across architecture, security, automation, and FinOps—driving smart, reliable solutions from design to deployment.




🚀 What You’ll Be Doing

As a Technical Operations Specialist to support MLOps , you will:

Lead security assessments and ensure policy compliance.
Optimize and monitor cloud infrastructure costs (FinOps).
Support MLOps architecture and contribute to system design and documentation.
Conduct PoCs and evaluate new technologies.
Break down technical tasks and support project planning.




🛠️ What You Bring

Solid experience with cloud platforms (ideally AWS) and cost optimization strategies.
Strong proficiency in Python, plus hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD tools like GitLab and ArgoCD.
Familiarity with security concepts (Zero Trust, SAML, OAuth).
Experience with monitoring/observability tools like Grafana, ELK, or Datadog.
Experience with MLOps tools like Kubeflow or KServe is a plus




💡 Why Join Us?

At Akkodis, you'll collaborate with forward-thinking engineers, data scientists, and architects on impactful AI initiatives. We offer a dynamic environment where your ideas matter, and your growth is supported.
Ready to make an impact at the intersection of AI and infrastructure?
Let’s build the future together.

Show more

  • Let’s build the future together.

Title: Research Scientist
Description:
At Nestlé Nutrition, our mission is to nurture a Healthier Generation. We aim to achieve this by leading the way in Research and Development of science proven nutrition solutions and by partnering with parents and healthcare professionals around the world. From pre-conception to adulthood, we are widening our reach and opening up new opportunities across the lifelong nutrition journey.

Position Snapshot

Location: Konolfingen (BE), Switzerland

Company: Nestlé Product & Technology Center (NPTC), Science & Technology

Act. Rate: Full-Time

Type of contract: Permanent contract

What We Offer At Nestlé

Exciting opportunities to develop your career your way; across different brands, businesses, functions, and regions.

Flexible working arrangements - facilitating creativity and collaboration A culture of respect, with diversity, equity and inclusion at its core. Learn more here.

A dynamic international environment empowering you to learn, develop and grow.

Don’t hesitate to connect with us during the recruitment process to learn more.

Position Summary

As a Research Scientist you will be investigating innovative product / process concepts through applied research and provide scientific contributions to product / process development projects. You will be mainly working in the field of powdered products, leveraging your technical expertise on dry processing of food powders (e.g. spray drying).

A Day in the Life of a Research Scientist


Plan and execute scientific experiments and projects to develop new concepts of potential business importance
Contribute to project work, e.g. through project management, scientific advice, required analyses and technical assistance
Document and communicate results in reports, presentations, NesTMS etc.
Apply, build and maintain knowledge / expertise in the field of powder science & drying technologies; keep up with developments in aligned research fields, scientific and analytical disciplines
Assess, elaborate, transfer methods (traditional, rapid)
Maintain scientific / analytical network; liaise with other R&D units
Represent NPTC Nutrition / Nestlé in field of expertise
Provide leadership, focus and motivational support to laboratory team
Integrate and coach collaborators (e.g. lab technicians, apprentices, master students)
Assist Group Manager in recruiting, integrating, coaching and developing people
Assure Good Laboratory Practice and efficient laboratory operation


What Will Make You Successful


Ph.D. in Food Science, Food Engineering (or a related discipline) or equivalent experience in R&D
Several years of experience in managing R&D projects or activities, preferably in the food industry.
Experince on functional properties of food powders and their characterization
Strong knowledge of drying and powder handling technologies.
Excellent scientific / technical know-how in data analysis and visualization
Good understanding of digital tools for research
Fluent in written and spoken English, German is a plus
Good leadership and people management skills, at ease with frequent scope change
Excellent communication skills


Nestlé is committed to the accessibility of its recruitment process. If you require an adaptation during the recruitment process, please do let us know so we can support you effectively. All information will be treated confidentially.

At Nestlé Research and Development in Konolfingen near Bern / Switzerland, we develop for Nestlé worldwide, new products, processes and packaging concepts for a broad range of products of our Nutrition, Dairy, Health Science and Coffee businesses. In addition, we also provide technical assistance to our factories.
Show more

Title: Member of Technical Staff, AI Post Training
Description:
Help us develop and train the cutting-edge models that are served in Copilot.

 

At Microsoft AI, we are on a mission to develop the most cutting-edge algorithms for post-training large language models (LLMs) and ship those models to millions of users using Copilot every day.  

 

The AI Post-Training team at Microsoft AI is responsible for all aspects of post-training the models that we serve in Copilot, including: data collection, building evaluations that are aligned with our product and model capability goals, prototyping new capabilities to make Copilot more powerful, developing new finetuning algorithms to supercharge our models, working with platform and engineering teams to deploy those models, and closing the loop by improving the models with feedback we receive from our users. We work on the bleeding edge and leverage the most powerful pretrained models and algorithms for our needs. We are an interdisciplinary team of engineers and scientists, learning from each other and collaborating to create the best models and products. 

 

We are looking for outstanding individuals excited about contributing to the next generation of models that will transform the field. We are looking for candidates who: 


Are passionate about shipping models into products that users will love 
Will thrive in a highly collaborative, fast-paced environment 
Have a high degree of craftsmanship and pay close attention to details 
Demonstrate a proactive attitude and enthusiasm for exploring new methods and technologies 
Are willing to meaningfully contribute as individuals with multiple responsibilities and can adjust to shifting priorities


Responsibilities


Develop data collection, evaluation, and finetuning methods for models. 
Design hypotheses and experiment plans for rapidly iterating on model performance. 
Prototype new model features and capabilities and collaborate with engineers and researchers across Microsoft AI to make them a reality. 
Collaborate with pretraining and product platform teams to establish good vertical integration and ship models that Copilot users love. 
Embody our culture and values. 


Qualifications


Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Math, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field AND experience in business analytics, data science, software development, data modeling or data engineering work
OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Math, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field AND experience in business analytics, data science, software development, or data engineering work OR equivalent experience.
Expertise in the area of Post-Training AI Models and in applying post-training techniques such as DPO, PPO, or RLHF


#Copilot #MicrosoftAI

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

Title: R&D
HTML:
Due to our high growth and commitment to technology, Medacta is seeking for a C++ Software Developer to join our development team. This team is responsible for creating preoperative planning software for orthopaedic surgeries. Specifically, we are seeking a developer to contribute to our desktop application for surgical planning. The ideal candidate will have experience in developing applications in C++ and specific expertise in QT, VTK, and ITK technologies, with a strong inclination toward 3D graphics. You will join a talented, young and dynamic software development team.

The candidate will be responsible for managing the following activities:

  • develop, test, and maintain C++ software applications focused on medical device functionality and surgical planning tools;
  • collaborate with regulatory, marketing, and project management teams to ensure alignment with industry regulations, product requirements, and project goals;
  • ensure compliance with medical device software standards (e.g., IEC 62304) and maintain thorough documentation for regulatory audits and submissions;
  • conduct code reviews and enforce best practices for code quality, documentation, and testing within the team;
  • contribute to risk analysis and usability assessments, working closely with cross-functional teams to address and mitigate potential issues;
  • provide technical support during clinical evaluations and product testing, addressing feedback and making iterative improvements;
  • continuously monitor and integrate relevant updates to software libraries, technologies, and industry standards to enhance software performance and security.

Hard Skills

The resource should also have the following skills:

  • bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering;
  • experience in medical device software development, with a proven record of designing or supporting software that meets regulatory requirement;
  • extensive experience with C++ programming, including hands-on experience with the Qt framework and CMake build systems;
  • strong background in 3D rendering software development;
  • solid understanding of linear algebra, including reference systems and transformation matrices;
  • proficiency with version control systems, particularly Git, and experience in a collaborative development environment;
  • experience with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker) to support deployment and testing processes;
  • knowledge of QML for the development of intuitive and responsive user interfaces;
  • experience working in cross-functional teams and managing input from regulatory, marketing, and project management perspectives.

Soft Skills

  • strong skills in planning, execution, and resource management across multiple projects;
  • excellent interpersonal and communication skills;
  • passion for writing great, simple, clean and efficient code;
  • awareness of the importance of the teamwork.

What We Offer

  • permanent contract;
  • flexible working hours;
  • carpooling organized by Medacta;
  • incentives for mobility by public transport;
  • advantageous conventions;
  • growth opportunity, working in a continuously improving and expanding environment;
  • annual salary review linked to performance and professional development;
  • continuous training.

Medacta International is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.

Title: Cientista de Dados em People Analytics
HTML:
Job Description

Somos mais que uma máquina, somos pessoas que transformam e criam infinitas possibilidades.

Trabalhamos para simplificar e impulsionar negócios para todas as pessoas, oferecendo soluções financeiras inteligentes. Aqui, investimos em tecnologia, promovemos desenvolvimento e fomentamos a inovação para criar novos caminhos possíveis e gerar impacto positivo no mundo.

Na Cielo, a gente trabalha com autonomia para escrever nossa própria jornada, liberdade para ser quem a gente é, e a oportunidade de fazer acontecer. Somos um time que sonha no plural, oferecendo uma experiência completa e focando no bem-estar físico e mental de nossos mais de 6.000 colaboradores e suas famílias.

Acreditamos na inclusão e acolhimento de todas as pessoas, com suas singularidades e diversidade de vivências.

Bora realizar seus sonhos com a gente!

Conheça mais sobre a área Gerência de People Analytics:

A Gerência de People Analytics tem como missão ser a área de referência no mercado atuando através de dados na estratégia de pessoas na Cielo.

#VemPraCima #VemPraCielo

Responsibilities and assignments

Tem Lugar Para Você Nesse Propósito

  • Coletar, limpar, explorar e analisar dados de pessoas relacionados aos temas de RH, exemplos: recrutamento, performance, engajamento, turnover, dados de áreas comerciais, entre outros;
  • Desenvolver modelos estatísticos preditivos / prescritivos (ex.: propensão de rotatitividade; análise de produtividade, clustering de perfis de colaboradores, etc);
  • Criação de dashboards e visualizações de dados, garantir que esses dashboards respondam a perguntas estratégicas e estejam atualizados com dados confiáveis;
  • Elaborar estudos de correlação e casualidade (ex: impacto de turnover sobre performance);
  • Trabalhar com diferentes fontes de dados, de diversos sistemas, conhecimentos de automatizações de fluxo e garantir a qualidade dos dados/informações;
  • Estabelecer parcerias internas e com áreas de negócio com o intuito de resolver problemas complexos e propor soluções baseadas em dados.


Requirements And Qualifications

O que o #TimeCielo espera de você?

  • Formação superior completa em disciplina quantitativa, como Estatística, Matemática, Ciência de Dados, Economia, Finanças, Engenharia, Ciência da Computação e afins;
  • Sólida experiência como Especialista de Dados ou função semelhante envolvendo extração de dados, análise, modelagem estatística e visualização de dados;
  • Sólida experiência utilizando linguagens de consulta de dados e lógica de programação (exemplo: SQL, Python, R, entre outras linguagens);
  • Análise estatística prática com uma sólida compreensão e utilização dos fundamentos de análise descritiva, probabilidade, regressão, inferência, testes de hipóteses, modelos de otimização e métodos quantitativos e/ou machine learning;
  • Perfil analítico, raciocínio logico e de resolução de problemas, com grande capacidade de manipulação de dados estruturados e não estruturados, para simplificação de análises e processos;
  • Desenvolvimento de apresentações executivas para liderança e áreas internas da companhia.


Additional information

Por que viver infinitas possibilidades ao nosso lado?

  • Assistência Médica e Odontológica;
  • Remuneração Variável Anual (PPR);
  • Auxílio Refeição e Alimentação;
  • Modelo Híbrido;
  • Auxílio Trabalho Remoto;
  • Seguro de Vida;
  • Seguro residencial e automóvel;
  • Assistência funeral familiar;
  • Previdência Privada;
  • Canal de apoio à especialistas (nutrição, psicologia, ginecologia, etc);
  • Campanha de Vacinação;
  • Acesso à diversos cursos em nossa plataforma Educa;
  • Wellhub;
  • Fretado/vale-transporte ou estacionamento;
  • Programa de Gestação Saudável;
  • Licença Maternidade e Paternidade estendida;
  • Auxílio Creche;
  • Dress Code Flexível;
  • Horário Flexível;
  • Sexta-curta;
  • Almoço estendido (1h30).


Process stages

  • Registration
  • Triagem
  • Entrevista RH
  • Entrevista Gestor(a)
  • Hiring


Vem pro #TimeCIelo, onde seu sonho de transformação encontra infinitas possibilidades de se tornar realidade!

Somos mais que uma máquina, somos pessoas que sonham, transformam e criam infinitas possibilidades juntas.

Aqui a gente é movido por sonhos e, mais importante, por transformação! Por isso, nos empenhamos todos os dias para cumprir a nosso propósito de simplificar e impulsionar negócios para todas as pessoas, oferecendo soluções financeiras inteligentes e acessíveis que estão no dia a dia de quem movimenta o Brasil.

Para isso, Investimos fortemente em tecnologia, criamos um ambiente propenso ao desenvolvimento e fomentamos a inovação para aumentar cada vez mais a nossa capacidade de criar novos caminhos possíveis e gerar impacto positivo no mundo.

Trabalhar na Cielo é aprender na prática e construir uma carreira diariamente.

No nosso dia a dia, a gente trabalha com autonomia para escrever nossa própria jornada, liberdade para ser quem a gente é e a oportunidade de fazer acontecer.

Nós sonhamos no plural, acolhendo e ajudando a realizar os sonhos das mais de 6.000 pessoas que fazem parte do #TimeCielo. E, para torná-los realidade, a gente oferece uma experiência completa e inesquecível para o nosso time, focando no bem-estar físico e mental não apenas dos nossos colaboradores e colaboradoras, mas também de suas famílias.

Além disso, a gente acredita que a resposta para conseguir vislumbrar novos futuros está na inclusão e acolhimento de todas as pessoas, com suas singularidades e diversidade de vivências. Por isso, não importa qual seja o seu sonho – pra sua vida, sua carreira, pra deixar sua marca no mundo –, tem lugar pra ele aqui, junto com os nossos. Vem pra Cima, vem pra Cielo!

Title: Cientista de Dados - Júnior
Description:
Introduction

In this role you will join IBM Consulting via our world class Associate Program for university hires. As an Associate at IBM Consulting you will have the opportunity to work with a diverse range of clients worldwide. Our clients' technical and business needs are constantly evolving. We're hiring inspired, talented individuals, who believe no problem is too big to solve.

We focus on your professional development through ongoing learning, mentorship, development of technical skills, and continuous personal growth, all grounded in a culture of coaching and career advancement. If you see yourself as someone who never stops learning and who wants to unleash your potential, the IBM Consulting Associates Program is for you.

A career in IBM Consulting is rooted by long-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe.

You’ll work with visionaries across multiple industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Your ability to accelerate impact and make meaningful change for your clients is enabled by our strategic partner ecosystem and our robust technology platforms across the IBM portfolio; including Software and Red Hat.

Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge serve as the foundation to success in IBM Consulting. In your role, you’ll be encouraged to challenge the norm, investigate ideas outside of your role, and come up with creative solutions resulting in ground breaking impact for a wide network of clients. Our culture of evolution and empathy centers on long-term career growth and development opportunities in an environment that embraces your unique skills and experience.

Your Role And Responsibilities

Are you passionate about data, technology and innovation? Do you want to take the first steps in your Data Science career, working on real projects that impact the business? Come and join our team!

As a junior data scientist, you will contribute to the development and adjustment of machine learning models, experimenting with different supervised and unsupervised algorithms. You will work on exploratory data analysis, identifying patterns and trends, and collaborating with data engineers to ensure the proper preparation of datasets.

You will also participate in the creation of proofs of concept (PoCs) to validate the technical feasibility of the models, documenting results and analyzing metrics such as precision, recall and F1-score. In addition, you will support the transition of models to production, ensuring reproducibility and alignment with project needs.

Responsibilities


Developing and adjusting machine learning models to solve business challenges.
Perform exploratory analysis to identify patterns and trends in data.
Collaborating with data engineers to prepare and validate datasets.
Participating in the creation of PoCs and documenting model results and metrics.
Assisting in the transition of models to production, ensuring reproducibility and alignment with project objectives.


Required Technical And Professional Expertise


Experience in data science, machine learning or related areas.
Knowledge of Python for data analysis and modeling.
Notions of statistics, probability and machine learning fundamentals.
Familiarity with cloud resources for data (Azure, AWS or GCP), especially Azure Machine Learning.
Desire to learn and evolve in a collaborative and innovative environment.


Preferred Technical And Professional Experience


Experience or interest in tools such as Azure Cognitive Services, Azure ML AutoML, Azure Container Instances, Azure Databricks and Azure Synapse Analytics.
Knowledge of deploying models and monitoring in a cloud environment.
Experience in analyzing model performance metrics (precision, recall, F1-score).

Introduction

In this role you will join IBM Consulting via our world class Associate Program for university hires. As an Associate at IBM Consulting you will have the opportunity to work with a diverse range of clients worldwide. Our clients' technical and business needs are constantly evolving. We're hiring inspired, talented individuals, who believe no problem is too big to solve.

We focus on your professional development through ongoing learning, mentorship, development of technical skills, and continuous personal growth, all grounded in a culture of coaching and career advancement. If you see yourself as someone who never stops learning and who wants to unleash your potential, the IBM Consulting Associates Program is for you.

A career in IBM Consulting is rooted by long-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe.

You’ll work with visionaries across multiple industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Your ability to accelerate impact and make meaningful change for your clients is enabled by our strategic partner ecosystem and our robust technology platforms across the IBM portfolio; including Software and Red Hat.

Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge serve as the foundation to success in IBM Consulting. In your role, you’ll be encouraged to challenge the norm, investigate ideas outside of your role, and come up with creative solutions resulting in ground breaking impact for a wide network of clients. Our culture of evolution and empathy centers on long-term career growth and development opportunities in an environment that embraces your unique skills and experience.

Your Role And Responsibilities

Are you passionate about data, technology and innovation? Do you want to take the first steps in your Data Science career, working on real projects that impact the business? Come and join our team!

As a junior data scientist, you will contribute to the development and adjustment of machine learning models, experimenting with different supervised and unsupervised algorithms. You will work on exploratory data analysis, identifying patterns and trends, and collaborating with data engineers to ensure the proper preparation of datasets.

You will also participate in the creation of proofs of concept (PoCs) to validate the technical feasibility of the models, documenting results and analyzing metrics such as precision, recall and F1-score. In addition, you will support the transition of models to production, ensuring reproducibility and alignment with project needs.

Responsibilities

  • Developing and adjusting machine learning models to solve business challenges.
  • Perform exploratory analysis to identify patterns and trends in data.
  • Collaborating with data engineers to prepare and validate datasets.
  • Participating in the creation of PoCs and documenting model results and metrics.
  • Assisting in the transition of models to production, ensuring reproducibility and alignment with project objectives.

Required Technical And Professional Expertise

  • Experience in data science, machine learning or related areas.
  • Knowledge of Python for data analysis and modeling.
  • Notions of statistics, probability and machine learning fundamentals.
  • Familiarity with cloud resources for data (Azure, AWS or GCP), especially Azure Machine Learning.
  • Desire to learn and evolve in a collaborative and innovative environment.

Preferred Technical And Professional Experience

  • Experience or interest in tools such as Azure Cognitive Services, Azure ML AutoML, Azure Container Instances, Azure Databricks and Azure Synapse Analytics.
  • Knowledge of deploying models and monitoring in a cloud environment.
  • Experience in analyzing model performance metrics (precision, recall, F1-score).

Title: Data Scientist SR I Performance
Description:
Sobre o Bradesco

O Bradesco é um dos maiores grupos financeiros do Brasil, com uma história marcada pelo pioneirismo e inovação. Por meio da nossa carteira amplamente diversificada de produtos financeiros, serviços bancários e de seguros contribuímos com a realização das pessoas e o crescimento sustentável de empresas e sociedade. Venha fazer parte do nosso ecossistema financeiro e impactar a experiência de milhões de pessoas!

Saiba mais em https://banco.bradesco/html/classic/sobre/index.shtm

Responsabilidades e atribuições

O que é o nosso time de Crédito - Precificação?

O departamento O Departamento de Crédito possui como missão garantir uma gestão eficiente na concessão e manutenção de crédito, que assegure rentabilidade e o crescimento com solidez dos ativos da Organização. Dentro do departamento, temos a estrutura de Precificação, responsável por modelar e definir preços de todos os produtos de crédito para pessoas físicas (PF) e jurídicas (PJ) do segmento massificado.

Modelo de trabalho :Hibrido - 2x presencial

Unidade: Osasco/SP

Como será seu dia a dia?

Sendo Analista de Precificação SR, atuará na gerência Crédito - Precificação e suas principais atividades serão:



Desenvolver estratégias de precificação e implementar em diferentes produtos e serviços bancários;
Acompanhar, analisar e fazer o tratamento de dados para uso na estratégia;
Interagir com diversos departamentos internos para garantir sinergia e eficiência das entregas;
Auxiliar no desenvolvimento e treinamento dos demais analistas da equipe;
Preparar relatórios detalhados e apresentações para a executiva.



Requisitos e Qualificações

O que você precisa ter ou saber?



Formação em Estatística, Engenharia, Administração, Economia ou áreas correlatas;
Conhecimento em matemática financeira e análises estatísticas;
Experiências anteriores em Precificação ou áreas correlatas.



Será um diferencial se você tiver:



Conhecimento em Programação e Banco de dados (Phyton, SQL, Dataviz).



O que nós oferecemos

No Bradesco valorizamos a saúde e bem-estar, oferecendo um extenso portfólio de benefícios a todas nossas pessoas funcionárias:



PLR ou Bônus: Conforme a elegibilidade de cargo*

Convênio Odontológico

Title: Cientista de Dados Jr. - TI - Data & Analytics (São Paulo/SP)
HTML:
Você é curioso(a), apaixonado(a) por dados e quer começar sua jornada transformando números em decisões estratégicas?

Venha ser nosso(a) Cientista de Dados Júnior! Aqui, você vai atuar ao lado de um time experiente, participando do desenvolvimento de análises, modelos preditivos e soluções inteligentes que impactam diretamente os nossos resultados.

O nosso time de Dados e Tecnologia está de portas abertas te esperando!

#vemseralares

#vagasalaresinternet

Prazo de inscrição para Recrutamento Interno: 16 à 23/05

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Você vai fazer aqui:

  • Apoiar na coleta, limpeza e organização de dados de diferentes fontes (estruturadas e não estruturadas);
  • Realizar análises exploratórias para identificar padrões e gerar insights para as áreas de negócio;
  • Contribuir no desenvolvimento de modelos estatísticos, de machine learning e IA generativa, com supervisão do time;
  • Participar da documentação de processos analíticos, pipelines de dados e entregas de projetos;
  • Trabalhar em parceria com as áreas de negócio, BI e engenharia de dados para resolver problemas reais com soluções analíticas.
  • Proporcionar a constante evolução da rotina de trabalho, alinhada as metodologias ágeis.


Requisitos e qualificações

Você não pode deixar de ter:

  • Ensino Superior Completo, completo ou em andamento, em Tecnologia, Ciência de Dados, Engenharia, Matemática, Estatística ou áreas afins;
  • Conhecimentos em técnicas de Modelagem de Dados e ETL;
  • Conhecimento básico em linguagens de programação para análise de dados (Preferencialmente Python);
  • Noções de SQL para consultas em bancos de dados relacionais;
  • Familiaridade com conceitos de estatística básica e de machine learning;
  • Conhecimento básico de visualização de dados;
  • Capacidade de organizar e documentar análises;
  • Conhecimento em Metodologias ágeis como o Scrum e Kanban.
  • Perfil colaborativo e proativo, com vontade de aprender e contribuir com o time.


Se você tiver, será um diferencial:

  • Já ter trabalhado em projetos práticos, acadêmicos ou pessoais envolvendo análise ou ciência de dados.
  • Conhecimento em ferramentas de Data Warehouse ou bancos como BigQuery;
  • Vivência em disponibilização de dados através do uso de APIs;
  • Experiência em empresas de Telecom;
  • Experiência com versionamento de código (Git/GitHub);
  • Inglês Técnico (para leitura de logs);
  • Conhecimento básico em ferramentas de orquestração de dados como Airflow;
  • Capacidade de explicar conceitos analíticos de forma clara para públicos não técnicos;
  • Conhecimento em Cloud Computing e ecossistema de BIG Data (Preferencialmente GCP).


Informações adicionais

Você terá aqui:

  • Vale Refeição ou Alimentação;
  • Vale Transporte;
  • Plano de Saúde;
  • Seguro de Vida;
  • Participação nos lucros;
  • Desconto nos Pacotes de Internet.

Title: Data Science Analyst
HTML:
CONSTRUA SUA CARREIRA NA GETNET!

Somos uma empresa global de tecnologia que fornece soluções de pagamento, fazemos parte da PagoNxt, o hub de pagamentos do Grupo Santander. Operando em mais de 10 países, nossa missão é imaginar, cuidar e simplificar, usando tecnologia e inovação para atender nossos clientes, desde pequenos empreendedores até grandes corporações, com soluções físicas e digitais para todos os tipos de negócios.

Vamos construir o futuro, juntos?

Estamos moldando o futuro dos métodos de pagamento, conectando comunidades e empresas de forma simples e eficaz. Essa jornada é conduzida por pessoas dedicadas a aprimorar constantemente nossas soluções. Aqui, imaginamos o amanhã, cuidamos do hoje e simplificamos o agora, construindo um futuro Wow!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

💼 Sua missão em nosso time será:

  • Atuar desde o entendimento das necessidades do negócio junto ao stakeholders até a entrega e sustentação de modelos em produção;
  • Conduzir análises exploratórias e estudos estatísticos para identificação de oportunidades e geração de hipóteses;
  • Desenvolvimento de pipelines e de modelos de Machine Learning;
  • Utilizar técnicas de validação de modelos, como testes A/B, testes de hipóteses e análises de performance do modelo;
  • Documentar todas as etapas do desenvolvimento garantindo alinhamento com os Stakeholders;
  • Monitorar a performance dos modelos em produção, buscando identificar necessidades de retreinamento ou eventuais melhorias.


🎓 O que é necessário pra se inscrever:

  • Experiencia pratica com Databricks;
  • Experiência com experimentação de modelos (teste A/B, testes de hipóteses e analises de performance);
  • Conhecimento em Python e/ou Scala;
  • Capacidade de comunicação clara com áreas de negócio e stakeholders com a finalidade de extrair a necessidade e construir uma solução aderente ao negócio;
  • Machine Learning;
  • Estatísticas e Probabilidade;
  • Análise descritiva e de inferência.


🚀 Será bacana se você possuir:

  • Conhecimento sobre Deep Learning;
  • Conhecimento sobre MLOps;
  • Versionamento e rastreabilidade de modelos;
  • Feature Engineering (Feature Store integrado ao Databricks).



🏢 Oportunidade para atuar em São Paulo/SP ou Porto Alegre/RS

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

DIVERSIDADE, EQUIDADE E INCLUSÃO

Na Getnet, acreditamos que uma cultura inclusiva é o que nos torna mais fortes. Sabemos que as pessoas prosperam quando sentem que pertencem à empresa, e é por isso que estamos comprometidos em criar um local de trabalho onde todos se sintam vistos, valorizados e motivados a crescer. Esse compromisso não é apenas fundamental para nossa estratégia de negócios - é a coisa certa a fazer.


CONFIRA NOSSOS BENEFÍCIOS

🩺Assistência Médica;

🦷Assistência Odontológica;

🏋️🧘🏻‍♀️Gympass;

🎂Day off de aniversário;

🔐Seguro de Vida;

🍕VR/VA;

🤑PPR;

👶👧Auxílio creche;

🤰Extensão dos períodos de licença maternidade e paternidade;

🧠SelfCare - Programa de Saúde Mental e Bem-estar;

📚Incentivo Idiomas (Inglês ou Espanhol);

Acesso a uma plataforma de learning conectada a todos os conteúdos do LinkedIn Learning e o'Reilly;

📈Possibilidade de contratação de empréstimos pessoais com juros menores que os de mercado.

Title: Data Scientist III
Description:
Sobre o Bradesco

O Bradesco é um dos maiores grupos financeiros do Brasil, com uma história marcada pelo pioneirismo e inovação. Por meio da nossa carteira amplamente diversificada de produtos financeiros, serviços bancários e de seguros contribuímos com a realização das pessoas e o crescimento sustentável de empresas e sociedade. Venha fazer parte do nosso ecossistema financeiro e impactar a experiência de milhões de pessoas!

Saiba mais em https://banco.bradesco/html/classic/sobre/index.shtm

Responsabilidades e atribuições

O que é o nosso time de GRF - Gerenciamento de Riscos Financeiros?

A área de GRF - Gerenciamento de Riscos Financeiros tem como missão promover e viabilizar o controle de riscos e a alocação de capital, através de práticas robustas e da certificação da existência, da execução e da efetividade de controles que assegurem níveis aceitáveis de riscos nos processos da Organização, de forma independente, consistente, transparente e integrada.

Modelo de trabalho :Híbrido - 3x presencial

Unidade: Osasco - SP/Matriz

Como será seu dia a dia?

Sendo Data Scientist III, atuará na gerência Risco de Crédito e suas principais atividades serão:



Desenvolver os modelos dos parâmetros de Perda Esperada do segmento Massificado Pessoa Física e Jurídica (PD, LGD, EAD e FWL);
Monitorar os modelos desenvolvidos na área, garantindo a qualidade das medidas estatísticas ao longo do tempo;
Realizar estudos dando suporte aos gestores e aos usuários dos modelos implantados, atuando em todo ciclo de vida do modelo (desenvolvimento, monitoramento e uso);
Apoiar e suportar as áreas no gerenciamento de risco de crédito e nas avaliações de risco/retorno das operações sujeitas ao risco de crédito;
Interagir e apoiar os analistas da área nas atividades diárias;



Requisitos e Qualificações

O que você precisa ter ou saber?



Graduação completa em Estatística, Matemática, Física, Ciências Atuariais, Engenharias, Ciência de dados e áreas correlatas;
Conhecimento em SAS;
Conhecimento em Phyton;
Conhecimento em Databricks;
Conhecimento em SQL;
Vivência com desenvolvimento de modelos para risco de crédito;



Será um diferencial se você tiver:



Inglês básico/intermediário para leitura de artigos (acadêmicos/técnicos) para estudo de técnicas

No Bradesco valorizamos a saúde e bem-estar, oferecendo um extenso portfólio de benefícios a todas nossas pessoas funcionárias:

Title: Cientista de Dados - Mercado Envios
Description:
No Mercado Livre estamos democratizando o comércio, o dinheiro e os pagamentos na América Latina. Faça parte desse propósito!




Imagine você empreendendo projetos desafiadores, dinâmicos e inovadores, e sendo responsável por:

Analisar grandes volumes de dados e gerar insights que aumentem a eficiência operacional e a tomada de decisões de curto prazo.
Desenvolver e manter modelos de forecast intra-diário (D0 a D+3) que permitam antecipar comportamentos e necessidades operacionais.
Automatizar fluxos de trabalho e relatórios operacionais utilizando Python e SQL, melhorando a qualidade e a velocidade das entregas.
Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares para entender suas necessidades, traduzi-las em soluções técnicas e validar os resultados.
Documentar e compartilhar achados de forma clara e estruturada, facilitando a tomada de decisão baseada em dados.
Participar ativamente de espaços de melhoria contínua, propondo ideias e soluções para otimizar modelos, processos e ferramentas.




Requisitos?

Ter conhecimentos intermediários em estatística e machine learning (regressão, classificação, séries temporais, modelos supervisionados).Domínio avançado de SQL, incluindo CTEs (Common Table Expressions), funções analíticas e de janela como LAG(), LEAD(), RANK() e OVER(PARTITION BY ...).
Possui conhecimento intermediário de Python para análise de dados e automação (bibliotecas como pandas, numpy).
Demonstrar conhecimento básico a intermediário de Git e participação no fluxo colaborativo de trabalho com Pull Requests (PRs).
Ter experiência em comunicação de resultados técnicos para públicos diversos.




A tecnologia é a essência do nosso produto. Nossas equipes de desenvolvimento, arquitetura, banco de dados, user experience, cibersegurança e data & analytics cocriam e são responsáveis pela plataforma líder de e-commerce da América Latina e um dos sites de maior tráfego em todo o mundo. Em uma indústria que é reinventada todos os dias, nossas equipes são reconhecidas por sua visão e liderança. De aplicativos móveis até machine learning, nossa inovação tem um foco claro: simplificar a vida de quem usa nossos produtos.




Nós lhe propomos:

Ser parte de uma empresa com espírito empreendedor, na qual adoramos pensar grande e em longo prazo.
Ser protagonista de seu desenvolvimento em um ambiente de oportunidades, aprendizagem, crescimento, expansão e projetos desafiadores.
Compartilhar e aprender em equipe, com excelentes profissionais e especialistas.
Um excelente clima de trabalho, com todo o necessário para você viver uma grande experiência. :)




Show more
